org.corfudb.runtime

Class CorfuRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.CorfuRuntime

  • public class CorfuRuntime
extends Object
    Created by mwei on 12/9/15.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters
      A class which holds parameters and settings for the CorfuRuntime.
      class  CorfuRuntime.TrimSnapshot
      Trim Snapshot contains the address at which the log was trimmed and the timestamp at which the runtime learnt the trim.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      UUID clusterId
      The UUID of the cluster we are currently connected to, or null, if there is no cluster yet.
      CompletableFuture<Layout> layout
      A completable future containing a layout, when completed.
      long matureTrimMark
      Trim snapshot which was recorded more than CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters.resolvedStreamTrimTimeout duration ago and can now be used the trim the resolvedQueue safely.
      static BiFunction<CorfuRuntime,String,IClientRouter> overrideGetRouterFunction
      When set, overrides the default getRouterFunction.

    • Field Detail

      • matureTrimMark

        public volatile long matureTrimMark
        Trim snapshot which was recorded more than CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters.resolvedStreamTrimTimeout duration ago and can now be used the trim the resolvedQueue safely.

      • layout

        public volatile CompletableFuture<Layout> layout
        A completable future containing a layout, when completed.

      • clusterId

        public volatile UUID clusterId
        The UUID of the cluster we are currently connected to, or null, if there is no cluster yet.

      • overrideGetRouterFunction

        public static BiFunction<CorfuRuntime,String,IClientRouter> overrideGetRouterFunction
        When set, overrides the default getRouterFunction. Used by the testing framework to ensure the default routers used are for testing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CorfuRuntime

        @Deprecated
public CorfuRuntime()
        Deprecated. Use fromParameters(CorfuRuntimeParameters)
        Constructor for CorfuRuntime.

        @Deprecated
public CorfuRuntime(String configurationString)
        Deprecated. Use fromParameters(CorfuRuntimeParameters)
        Parse a configuration string and get a CorfuRuntime.
        Parameters:
        configurationString - The configuration string to parse.

    • Method Detail

      • addTrimSnapshot

        public void addTrimSnapshot(@NonNull
                            long trimMark,
                            @NonNull
                            long timestamp)
        Adds the trim snapshot to the linked list.
        Parameters:
        trimMark - Address at which the log was trimmed.
        timestamp - Timestamp at which the trim was learnt.

      • registerSystemDownHandler

        @Deprecated
public CorfuRuntime registerSystemDownHandler(Runnable handler)
        Deprecated. 
        Register SystemDownHandler. Please use CorfuRuntimeParameters builder to register this.
        Parameters:
        handler - Handler to invoke in case of system Down.
        Returns:
        CorfuRuntime instance.

      • registerBeforeRpcHandler

        @Deprecated
public CorfuRuntime registerBeforeRpcHandler(Runnable handler)
        Deprecated. 
        Register BeforeRPCHandler. Please use CorfuRuntimeParameters builder to register this.
        Parameters:
        handler - Handler to invoke before every RPC.
        Returns:
        CorfuRuntime instance.

      • fromParameters

        public static CorfuRuntime fromParameters(@Nonnull
                                          CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters parameters)
        Factory method for generating new CorfuRuntimes given a set of CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters to configure the runtime with.
        Parameters:
        parameters - A CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters to use.
        Returns:
        A new CorfuRuntime.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the CorfuRuntime. Stops async tasks from fetching the layout. Cannot reuse the runtime once shutdown is called.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop all routers associated with this runtime & disconnect them.

      • stop

        public void stop(boolean shutdown)
        Stop all routers associated with this Corfu Runtime.

      • getStreamID

        public static UUID getStreamID(String string)
        Get a UUID for a named stream.
        Parameters:
        string - The name of the stream.
        Returns:
        The ID of the stream.

        public static UUID getCheckpointStreamIdFromId(UUID streamId)

      • getCheckpointStreamIdFromName

        public static UUID getCheckpointStreamIdFromName(String streamName)

      • getVersionString

        public static String getVersionString()
        Get corfu runtime version.

      • setTransactionLogging

        public CorfuRuntime setTransactionLogging(boolean enable)
        If enabled, successful transactions will be written to a special transaction stream (i.e. TRANSACTION_STREAM_ID)
        Parameters:
        enable - indicates if transaction logging is enabled
        Returns:
        corfu runtime object

      • parseConfigurationString

        public CorfuRuntime parseConfigurationString(String configurationString)
        Parse a configuration string and get a CorfuRuntime.
        Parameters:
        configurationString - The configuration string to parse.
        Returns:
        A CorfuRuntime Configured based on the configuration string.

      • addLayoutServer

        public CorfuRuntime addLayoutServer(String layoutServer)
        Add a layout server to the list of servers known by the CorfuRuntime.
        Parameters:
        layoutServer - A layout server to use.
        Returns:
        A CorfuRuntime, to support the builder pattern.

      • getRouter

        public IClientRouter getRouter(String address)
        Get a router, given the address.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the router to get.
        Returns:
        The router.

      • invalidateLayout

        public void invalidateLayout()
        Invalidate the current layout. If the layout has been previously invalidated and a new layout has not yet been retrieved, this function does nothing.

      • connect

        public CorfuRuntime connect()
        Connect to the Corfu server instance. When this function returns, the Corfu server is ready to be accessed.

      • enableTls

public CorfuRuntime enableTls(String keyStore,
                                          String ksPasswordFile,
                                          String trustStore,
                                          String tsPasswordFile)
        Deprecated. Deprecated, set using CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters instead.
        Enable TLS.

public CorfuRuntime setBackpointersDisabled(boolean disable)
        Deprecated. Deprecated, set using CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters instead.
        Whether or not to disable backpointers
        Parameters:
        disable - True, if the cache should be disabled, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        A CorfuRuntime to support chaining.
